replies.context: yea...like pushing it right into earths path...

context:
I was hoping this was a response to Elon Musk's space Tesla. NASA needs to send a Dodge Dart.  

Of course Musk stole the idea from Heavy Metal.  There were only 2 cars in that whole movie:  A Checker Cab and a 1960 Corvette.  The Corvette has been to space.  Forget the Dart. Send a Checker Cab - complete with death-ray just in case.  It's a dangerous solar system out there - can't trust aliens.
Without Bruce Willis on board, it does not stand a chance of success.
